text: In the 1940 federal election in Canada, Louis-Gérard Gosselin ran as an Anti- Conscriptionist candidate. Running in the Quebec riding of St. Henry, Gosselin received 642 votes on a platform opposing the imposition of conscription during World War II. ==See also== Conscription Crisis of 1944 Category:Year of birth missing Category:Possibly living people Category:20th-century Canadian politicians
title: Louis-Gérard Gosselin
